Reconciliation

Scenario: A Divine Convoy has been spotted docking in the Truth and Reconciliation, a ship Cortana disabled before abandoning the Autumn, if the ship is important enough for a Prophet to visit, Captain Keyes has to be onboard

Objective 1: Board the Ket Class Cruiser Truth and Reconciliation

  • Objective 1A: Sabotage Covenant Weevils
    • Reward: Ally reinforcements are available in O2
  • Objective 1B: Secure landing zones for allies
    • Reward: More ally reinforcements in O2
  • Objective 1C: Capture Covenant fortifications
    • Reward: Less enemy reinforcements in O2

Twist: None

Objective 2: Rescue Captain Keyes

  • Objective 2A: Free UNSC POWs
    • Reward: More ally spawns in Prophecy
  • Objective 2B: Upload Cortana to the Computer
    • Reward: Triggers Sharqoi spawns, also Sharqoi spawn in Prophecy
  • Objective 2C: Kill a Sangheili Zealot
    • Reward 2C: More ally spawns during Bravery

Conclusion: Captain Jacob Keyes is rescued and was interrogated by the Prophet of Inquisition, kept rambling about the ring, seemed relieved that Captain Keyes didn't know “its true power”, escaped with Captain Keyes in a Phantom
